title: BabyBandit
author: BabyBandit
created_time: November 19, 2023, 07:23:21 PMLast edit: November 20, 2023, 10:51:34 AM by BabyBandit
content: Hi BT-forum, I been thinking a bit of what Bitcoin actually have been giving us (me) ¬†I can start with myself. I was quite late in the crypto world and my only regret is that I didn't start earlier! The best thing is that thanks to bitcoin I get an extra income every month from trading and I have find new friends that I probably never would meet if it wasn't for Bitcoin. I also for the first time in my life have been able to save some money for a later period in my life and that is only thanks to Bitcoin. I am a small business owner and the most money always go back into the business, but thanks to the Bitcoin-P2P-trading I am also able to save and hold crypto for long time! ¬† ¬†So conclusion almost everything is better thanks to crypto, at least for me. ¬†I also in the process to set up a crypto payment system in my shops and I got help from this forum with the process. üôèIf I am allowed to ask how about you, what is the best thing that have come to you thanks to Bitcoin (crypto)? And is it any negative that came from it?What we all can and should do is to say thank you to Satoshi! üôè Without him we probably never would have been here and educate us self, and we don't only learn about Bitcoin we learn about how to handle many situations in life.

And I have for the first time in my life be able to save some money for a later period in my life everything is crypto. So conclusion everything is better thanks to crypto, at least for me.¬† Thank you Satoshi! üôèYou would have made same amount if you had traded stock or other asset aside Bitcoin and you would find more friends outside Bitcoin also. Bitcoin isn't supernatural it is not here to take away all the problems of mankind. Bitcoin rather is a Crypto-currency asset that can make financial system easier. In my opinion or my experience Bitcoin has made sending funds to my intended receiver fast, cheaper and no third party(bank or government). interference, Bitcoin has giving me the anonymity and privacy I need as I am my own bank, I can save my asset without the rigorous and privacy compromising process needed to open a bank account.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on November 19, 2023, 07:23:21 PM the best thing is that thanks to bitcoin I get an small income every month from tradingTo be honest, you chose the worst possible way to interact with bitcoin. There were so many ways to approach this. For instance by starting a business in the space or making your own business or the business that employs you to accept bitcoin, or pay employees in bitcoin, or at the very least give bitoin bonuses to clients instead of cashbacks and gift cards... If that's too ambitious, the easiest way is to buy and hold, become an investor, maybe a miner if you can afford it, a node operator...Let's say that's too ambitious, maybe start doing DCA? Maybe get a forum "job" and get paid in bitcoin... No, you chose to use bitcoin as the fiat making machine. Buy some, wait a day for it to go 5% up, sell, pay fees, send it to the bank and pay your tax and boom, you've made a whole 1% in pure profit. Congratulations. Quote from: BabyBandit on November 19, 2023, 07:23:21 PMThank you Satoshi! üôèYes, thank you Satoshi for more fiat money. I'm making some fiat money every day thanks to your invention.

comments.body: In as much that Bitcoin brought financial freedom to everyone either from government or becoming rich and others, I love bitcoin because since the creation of bitcoin has been solving problems while the first problem its officially solved brought the inception of a new technology(Blockchain) to the world after the challenges faced in inventing a functioning Blockchain was fixed by it. comments.author: Ryu_Ar1
comments.body: There are a few things I want to say in this case, the first is that I don't consider it a delay when in bitcoin because in the end everything that is done whether it's from a few years ago or just starting out all has its portion especially with the situation a few months earlier where bitcoin was still experiencing a decline that was enough to make us comfortable in buying then it was never too late for this.Secondly I feel that your approach to bitcoin is a little harsh and self-defeating, Not to demean and belittle your strategy but trading with your status as a beginner then the risk is quite high and I'm not even too sure you are profitable every month so therefore instead of using difficult methods it would be better to make a new thing where you do it by investing not trading. Indeed in this case trading is also quite good but it will not be able to be done by beginners who are still very high risk and I do not recommend this for beginners.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: One of the best things for me is that I can receive payments and make transactions seamlessly with it. Another is the independence of my finance. I have Salem control over it and can make purchases with ease as well as investments for the future.If not for the high fees we experience currently, the use of it to secure a happy Christmas celebration would have paid off well, but we know how it is that even the interest rates has even increased as well as the price of BTC and cost of transaction fees between P2p and for payments from the memepool. Still it is still one of the best things that has happened to me.
